sys_ws_operation.name: CCS Deployment Creds

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ws_operation"><sys_ws_operation action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><consumes>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</consumes><consumes_customized>false</consumes_customized><default_operation_uri/><enforce_acl>cf9d01d3e73003009d6247e603f6a990</enforce_acl><http_method>GET</http_method><name>CCS Deployment Creds</name><operation_script><![CDATA[(function process( /*RESTAPIRequest*/ request, /*RESTAPIResponse*/ response) {

    var pathParams = request.pathParams;
    var id = pathParams.id; //'sys_id of record'
    var deploymCredsGR = new GlideRecord('x_83068_cisco_lab_git_user_configuration');

    deploymCredsGR.addQuery("sys_id", id);
    deploymCredsGR.query();

    while (deploymCredsGR.next()) {
        var accountId = deploymCredsGR.getValue('c3_account_id');
        var apiK = deploymCredsGR.getValue('c3_api_key');
    }

	var apiKey = deploymCredsGR.c3_api_key.getDecryptedValue();
	var answer = accountId + ";" + apiKey;

    return answer;

})(request, response);]]></operation_script><operation_uri>/api/x_83068_cisco_lab/cisco_lab_of_the_future/ccs_deploymcreds/{id}</operation_uri><produces>application/json,application/xml,text/xml</produces><produces_customized>false</produces_customized><relative_path>/ccs_deploymcreds/{id}</relative_path><request_example/><requires_acl_authorization>true</requires_acl_authorization><requires_authentication>true</requires_authentication><requires_snc_internal_role>true</requires_snc_internal_role><short_description/><sys_class_name>sys_ws_operation</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2020-05-04 13:27:56</sys_created_on><sys_id>a69e380a1b6c9414c695fc88cc4bcbeb</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>CCS Deployment Creds</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future" source="x_83068_cisco_lab">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future">fe07f0fa1bf78c50c695fc88cc4bcbbc</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ws_operation_a69e380a1b6c9414c695fc88cc4bcbeb</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2020-05-04 13:40:20</sys_updated_on><web_service_definition display_value="Cisco Lab of the Future">318e3c0a1b6c9414c695fc88cc4bcb7a</web_service_definition><web_service_version/></sys_ws_operation></record_update>
